title: 7 Project
overview: 7 Project Series, a series of 7 stories, 7 flavors from Studio Wabi Sabi, which is packed with many teenage favorite actors such as Plan, Art, Boun, Prem, Peak, Boom, Santa, Earth, Soodyacht, and Sammy. All 7 stories include Would you be my love?, Once Upon A Time, Remember, Rhythm's Heart, Breakup Zone, VS Love, 50% My Puppy Love.
